titleInfo.title: USA v. Weiss
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - John C. Vanderslice appointed as counsel as to defendant Robert A. Weiss as ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester.(SED)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - John C. Vanderslice appointed as counsel as to defendant Robert A. Weiss as ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester.(SED)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Weiss
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. It is ordered that: (1) The defendant's objection 15 to the number of images will be resolved at sentencing. (2) Except to the extent (if at all) that I have reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. It is ordered that: (1) The defendant's objection 15 to the number of images will be resolved at sentencing. (2) Except to the extent (if at all) that I have reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Weiss
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to defendant Robert A. Weiss (1): Upon guilty plea to Counts I and II of the Information, the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of twenty-seven (27) months, followed by three (3) years of Supervised Release with special conditions, and ordered to pay a $100 Special Assessment(PAID); The defendant shall forfeit two ZIP disks to the Government as to Count II of the Information. Criminal Case Terminated. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (4 CC to USM)(JAR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to defendant Robert A. Weiss (1): Upon guilty plea to Counts I and II of the Information, the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of twenty-seven (27) months, followed by three (3) years of Supervised Release with special conditions, and ordered to pay a $100 Special Assessment(PAID); The defendant shall forfeit two ZIP disks to the Government as to Count II of the Information. Criminal Case Terminated. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (4 CC to USM)(JAR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Weiss
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. ***Rule 35(b) Motion Hearing set for 1/19/2007 12:45 PM in Courtroom 1 (Lincoln) before Judge Richard G. Kopf. The defendant shall be present for the hearing. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. ***Rule 35(b) Motion Hearing set for 1/19/2007 12:45 PM in Courtroom 1 (Lincoln) before Judge Richard G. Kopf. The defendant shall be present for the hearing. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Weiss
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT (Reduction of Sentence) as to Robert A. Weiss (1). The defendant plead guilty to Count(s) 1 and 2 of the Information. The defendant's sentence of imprisonment is reduced from the original sentence of 27 months to a term of 14 months, followed by 3 years of Supervised Release with special conditions, and ordered to pay a $100 Special Assessment(PAID); Count 2, The defendant shall forfeit two ZIP disks to the Government as to Count II of the Information as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. Defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by BOP before 2:00 p.m. no earlier than 60 days from today's date. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/19/07. 4 certified copies to USM.(CCB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: AMENDED JUDGMENT (Reduction of Sentence) as to Robert A. Weiss (1). The defendant plead guilty to Count(s) 1 and 2 of the Information. The defendant's sentence of imprisonment is reduced from the original sentence of 27 months to a term of 14 months, followed by 3 years of Supervised Release with special conditions, and ordered to pay a $100 Special Assessment(PAID); Count 2, The defendant shall forfeit two ZIP disks to the Government as to Count II of the Information as to defendant Robert A. Weiss. Defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by BOP before 2:00 p.m. no earlier than 60 days from today's date. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf on 1/19/07. 4 certified copies to USM.(CCB)
